messages.title: Madeleine's pledges to you
messages.content:
A FAIR DEAL ON INVESTMENT AND INFRASTRUCTURE - Delivering the investment in economic projects that Wales needs to prosper: renewable energy, rail and metro systems.
A FAIR DEAL FOR WORKERS - A Living Wage of £10 per hour and more Bank Holidays for hard pressed workers.
A FAIR DEAL FOR PENSIONERS - Protecting the Triple Lock for pensioners. Also, in Wales you can now keep much more of your money when going in to care.
A FAIR DEAL FOR YOUR FAMILY - Protecting free prescriptions, free school breakfasts, free bus passes and keeping support for veterans.

messages.title: Why I'm backing Madeleine
messages.content: As a local doctor, I've seen Madeleine's dedication within her role chairing All Party Parliamentary Groups for Motor Neurone Disease, Parkinson's, Suicide and Self Harm Prevention.

messages.title: Fighting for our security
messages.content: In an ever increasingly dangerous world, Tory cuts to our Armed Forces are threatening the security of the nation. The Royal Navy is woefully short of ships and there are real concerns about whether our troops have the equipment they need.

messages.title: Standing up to the Tories
messages.content: The Tories don't care about Wales, and will sacrifice our economy again if they win. They are planning to raid you and your family to pay for it by slashing the pensions Triple Lock and refusing to guarantee that food prices will not rise post Brexit and by putting VAT on more goods.

issues.defence: In an ever increasingly dangerous world, Tory cuts to our Armed Forces are threatening the security of the nation. The Royal Navy is woefully short of ships and there are real concerns about whether our troops have the equipment they need.
issues.economy: In a rapidly changing world with Brexit coming soon, it's absolutely vital that jobs, workers' rights and local businesses are protected. Tariffs would be devastating to local employers such as Tata Steel and Ford. I will fight to make sure their families across the Bridgend constituency have a secure future and that fundamental rights such as maternity leave are guaranteed.
issues.socialWelfare: Millions of women have lost out after the Tories have refused support to help them with changes to pension entitlements. Only by voting Labour can you send a message to the Tories that ordinary people shouldn't foot the bill for their failures.

community.content: Having been your MP for the last twelve years, has given me the experience needed to continue making sure the people of Bridgend have a strong MP who will fight for them.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've always been an independent minded MP, unafraid to stand up to the Tories or indeed to my own party when I've needed to. For twelve years as your MP, I've fought against cruel Tory policies such as the cuts to disability benefits which have targeted those who have the least. In our communities, I have always supported local residents and projects.
